about_the_game:
Robots have drawn humanity into war, and it's your job as Blaser Man and Turtle Belly Bot to infiltrate and wipe out the heart of these tin puppets!

Experience 10 varied levels based on classic games in Sidekick! But not only that, in Sidekick different genres are linked thematically. It doesn't matter whether it's run and gun, top-down shooter, or jet ski action, here you can find everything that made you happy and frustrated on the NES!

And of course, there is also a multiplayer mode, and it's 100% couch co-op! You and your friends! In real life, together! Shoot, I tell you, shoot!

short_description: Oh no! Nasty robots have come to earth and want to enslave humanity! You have to prevent that with the help of Blaster Man and Turtle Belly Bot! Shoot your way through 10 varied and far too difficult levels and save the world, or what will be left of it after this war!
